title: Narumugaiye Narumugaiye Lyrics Iruvar
stanzas:
Narumugaiye Narumugaiye
nee oru naaligai nillaai
sengani ooriya vaai thirandhu
nee oru thirumozhi sollaai

attrai thingal annilavil
netri tharala neer vadiya
kottrai poigai aadiyaval
neeyaa (2)

thirumagane thirumagane
nee oru naaligai paaraai
vennira puraviyil vandhavane
vel vizhi mozhigal kaelaai

attrai thingal annilavil
kottrai poigai aadugaiyil
ottrai paarvai paarthavanum
neeyaa (2)

mangai maan vizhi ambugal
en maar thulaithathenna(2)

nilaavile paartha vannam
kanaavile thondrum innum(2)
ilaithaen thudithaen
porukkavillai
idaiyil megalai irukkavillai

Narumugaiye Narumugaiye
nee oru naaligai nillaai
sengani ooriya vaai thirandhu
nee oru thirumozhi sollaai

attrai thingal annilavil
kottrai poigai aadugaiyil
ottrai paarvai paarthavanum
neeyaa

attrai thingal annilavil
netri tharala neer vadiya
kottrai poigai aadiyaval
neeyaa

Yaayum yaayum Â yaaraagi
ennul nenjin nernthathenna(2)
yaanum neeyum evvazhi aridhum
uravu serndhathenna

orey oru theendal seithaai
uyir kudi poothathenna(2)
sembuzham serndha neerthuli
pol ambudai nenjam
kalandhathenna...

thirumagane thirumagane
nee oru naaligai paaraai
vennira puraviyil vandhavane
vel vizhi mozhigal kaelaai (2)

attrai thingal annilavil
kottrai poigai aadugaiyil
ottrai paarvai paarthavanum
neeyaa

attrai thingal annilavil
netri tharala neer vadiya
kottrai poigai aadiyaval
neeyaa
